related_questions.question:
0. Rearrange these random letters into a good word    a r-u-s-m-e-m
b. w-e-n-r-i-t
Answer:

tolong di jawab kak​

Soal Ujian Semester Genap    SMAN 3 KARANG BARU
TP. 2020-2021
Mata Pelajaran
Nama
: Bahasa Inggris Peminatan
: Minarti, S.Pd
Kelas/Jurusan :X MIA IIS
Hari/Tanggal :
Pilihlah salah satu jawaban yang paling tepat!
CHOOSE THE CORRECT ANSWER!
The following text is for number 1 to 8
Galileo Galilei (1564-1642) — Astronomer and Scientist. Galileo developed a superior telescope and made
many significant discoveries in astronomy. He was sentenced to life imprisonment by the inquisition for his
support for the Copernican theory that the sun was at the centre of the solar system.
Galileo was born in Florence, Italy in 1564 to a poor but noble family His parents recognized their child's
innate intelligence and talents and so made sacrifices to have him educated. At his father's insistence, Galileo
studied the profitable career of medicine. But, at the University of Pisa, Galileo became fascinated in a wide
range of subjects. He was also critical of many of Aristotle's teaching which had dominated education for the
past 2,000 years.
Galileo was appointed to be a mathematics professor at the University of Pisa, but his strident criticisms of
Aristotle left him isolated among his contemporaries. After three years of persecution, he resigned and went
the University of Padua, where he taught maths. His entertaining lectures attracted a large following and he
able to spend the next 18 years pursuing his interests in astronomy and mechanics.
1. What type of the text above?
A. Narrative.
B. Report.
Biography​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Narrative

Teks Me-narasikan Kehidupan Galileo Galilei Dari Tahun 1564-1642, dan Penemuannya Serta Galileo Galilei yang berakhir di penjara. CMIIW

Penjelasan:

Semoga Membantu

related_questions.question: Tuliskan 5 usaha yang dapat dilakukan untuk menanggulangi pemanasan global​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. GUNAKAN TRANSPORTASI UMUM ATAU SEPEDA. ...

2. MINIMALKAN PENGGUNAAN PERALATAN YANG MENGANDUNG CFC. ...

3. MATIKAN PERANGKAT ELEKTRONIK SAAT TAK TERPAKAI. ...

4. HEMAT AIR. ...

5. Melakukan 3R , yaitu : Reuse , Reduce , Recycle. …

Jawaban:

tidak menebang pohon sembarangan

menghemat listrik

hemat bensin dengan menggunakan sepeda

tidak membakar hutan

dan mengurangi pemakaian alat yang mengandung cfc

related_questions.question:
ID sual 10 - 25!    My name is Calista Antartike. Just call me Calista My school is SD Pandemi. I am the student of the
fifth class. I will tell about professions that I can find at my school. There are headmaster, teachers, a
librarian, school staffs, and a gardener
Headmaster is the person who leads a school. Teachers are person who teach the students. Librar
is a person who works in a library. School staffs are persons who take care of the school's administration
and a gardener is a person who takes care of the school garden. artikan ke bahasa Indonesia ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Nama saya Calista Antartike. Panggil saja saya Calista Sekolah saya adalah SD Pandemi. Saya adalah siswa kelas lima. Saya akan menceritakan tentang profesi yang dapat saya temukan di sekolah saya. Ada kepala sekolah, guru, pustakawan, staf sekolah, dan tukang kebun Kepala sekolah adalah orang yang memimpin sekolah. Guru adalah orang yang mengajar siswa. Pustakawan adalah orang yang bekerja di perpustakaan. Staf sekolah adalah orang yang mengurus administrasi sekolah dan tukang kebun adalah orang yang mengurus taman sekolah.

Penjelasan:

Jadikan jawabanku tercerdas ya dekk, tks

related_questions.question: i am the student of the fift class. i Will tell about professions that i can find at my school. there are headmaster , teachers , a librarian , school staffs ,and ​

Sebutkan beberapa manfaat keragaman karakteristik
masyarakat Indonesia!​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

- Menumbuhkan Sikap Nasionalisme

- Identitas Bangsa di Mata Internasional

- Alat Pemersatu Bangsa

- Sebagai Ikon Pariwisata

- Memupuk Sikap Toleransi

- Menambah Pendapatan Nasional

Penjelasan:

Keberagaman adalah suatu kondisi dalam masyarakat yang terdapat banyak perbedaan dalam berbagai bidang

Answer by : Khairaaqueenapurba

related_questions.question:
1. Australia is
(big ) island in the world.
( the biggest - the bigest - biggest )​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Australia is

(big ) island in the world.

( the biggest - the bigest - biggest )​

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan merupakan bentuk Superlatif dari kata sifat satu suku kata yaitu Big. Bentuk Superlatifnya harus digandakan huruf g nya dan ditambahkan akhiran -est menjadi The Biggest.

Semoga membantu ya.
